home.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
home.subtitle: Quality-first developer with a unique QA leadership background

about.title: About Me
about.description: Self-taught Full-Stack Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience, including 5+ years in QA and project management leadership, and 3+ years in development. I specialize in modern web technologies with a unique quality-first development approach. I have a proven track record of building high-traffic applications serving 100K+ daily users and maintaining enterprise-grade SaaS platforms. I am a continuous learner with expertise gained through hands-on experience and structured online education.

stats.yearsDesc: Total industry experience across development and QA
stats.usersDesc: Daily users of applications developed and maintained
stats.bugsDesc: Critical production bugs across major QA projects

lookIntoThierEyes.title: Look Into Their Eyes
lookIntoThierEyes.description: Is a bilingual (Hebrew/English) web exhibition showcasing the work of Israeli graffiti artist Benzi Brofman, with a focus on paintings created after the October 7th tragedy. The site serves as a memorial platform to raise awareness for the hostages taken during this event.

jaMoveo.title: JaMoveo
jaMoveo.description: Is a collaborative musical rehearsal application that enables musicians to practice together virtually. The application serves as a digital platform for musical groups where participants with different instruments can view the same songs simultaneously, with each user seeing customized content based on their instrument (vocalists see only lyrics, while instrumentalists see both chords and lyrics).

reportsManager.title: Reports Manager
reportsManager.description: A comprehensive enterprise reporting system built for financial services, designed to automate complex Excel-based report processing and data analysis workflows. The application features a modern Windows app interface with multi-language support (Hebrew/English) and handles large-scale financial data processing with advanced error detection and resolution capabilities.

description.desc1: Designed and developed full-stack web applications using Next.js and modern React patterns.
description.desc2: Built and maintained enterprise desktop applications using WPF and .NET framework.
description.desc3: Implemented automated deployment workflows using GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines.
description.desc4: Drove project success through effective client communication and timely delivery.

description.desc1: Developed and maintained high-traffic web applications using Angular and React.
description.desc2: Led technical training sessions for 50+ developers on RxJS.
description.desc3: Created complex components used by 10+ teams, reducing development time.
description.desc4: Built scalable microservices using Node.js, NestJS, and Scala.

description.desc1: Built regression testing framework for embedded real-time systems.
description.desc2: Led QA for 3+ major platform projects with zero critical production bugs.
Established and maintained company-wide QA standards and processes.

description.desc1: Acted as a consultant for complex technical challenges, enhancing team problem-solving capabilities.

articles.title: Recent Articles
articles.forMore: For more articles on software development and quality engineering

angularCache.title: Building an Efficient Event Buffer Service in Angular with RxJS
angularCache.excerpt: How to reduce network overhead and improve performance by batching high-frequency events?

marketing.title: Marketing Performance
marketing.subtitle: Campaign Performance Highlights
marketing.description: Showcasing the growth metrics of a recent marketing campaign I managed, resulting in significant improvements across key performance indicators.
marketing.chartCaption: Performance metrics over a 3-month period showing consistent growth

career.metaDescription: Follow my professional journey from technical support to QA leadership to software engineering
career.title: My Professional Journey
career.subtitle: Exploring my transition from technical support to QA leadership to full-stack software engineering

bezeq.title: Senior Technical Service Representative
bezeq.description: Built a strong technical foundation while solving complex customer issues. Developed troubleshooting skills and learned to communicate technical concepts clearly to non-technical audiences.

myThings.title: QA & PM Team Leader
myThings.description: Led a team of 5 QA specialists delivering 50+ projects annually. Established company-wide quality standards and processes. Learned project management, team leadership, and strategic planning.

nova.title: QA Manual Test Engineer
nova.description: Built comprehensive regression testing frameworks for embedded real-time systems. Led QA for 3+ major platform projects with zero critical production bugs. Developed deeper technical expertise.

outbrain.title: Software Engineer
outbrain.description: Made the transition to full-time development, building high-traffic web applications using Angular and React. Created complex components used by 10+ teams. Led technical training sessions for 50+ developers.

freelance.title: Freelance Software Engineer
freelance.description: Designing and developing full-stack web applications using Next.js and modern React patterns. Building enterprise desktop applications with .NET. Implementing automated deployment workflows with CI/CD.

keyLearning.title: My Quality-First Approach
keyLearning.description: My journey from QA to development has shaped my unique perspective on software engineering. I approach every project with quality as the primary focus, combining rigorous testing methodologies with modern development practices to create robust, maintainable software that exceeds both technical requirements and user expectations.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.metaDescription: Terms of use for Nati Gurevich's portfolio website

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website (nati-gurevich.com), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: Website Description
description.content: This website serves as a professional portfolio and resume for Nati Gurevich, showcasing software development projects, professional experience, and contact information for potential employers and collaborators.

permitted.browse: Browse and view the content for informational purposes
permitted.contact: Use the contact information to reach out for professional opportunities
permitted.share: Share links to the website and its content

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.commercial: Use the website or its content for commercial purposes without permission
prohibited.modify: Modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any information obtained from this website
prohibited.harmful: Use the website in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the website
prohibited.rights: Violate any intellectual property rights or other proprietary rights

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content: The website and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Nati Gurevich and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws. All project code and implementations remain the intellectual property of their respective owners and clients.

links.title: External Links
links.content: This website may contain links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by Nati Gurevich. Please note that I do not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Nati Gurevich excludes all representations, warranties, conditions, and terms whether express or implied, statutory or otherwise.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Nati Gurevich, nor any of its officers, directors, and employees, be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this website whether such liability is under contract, tort, or otherwise.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: Nati Gurevich reserves the right to revise these terms of use at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of use.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact me at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy policy for Nati Gurevich's portfolio website

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Nati Gurevich ('I', 'me', or 'my') collects, uses, and protects your information when you visit my portfolio website. I am committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about my data practices.

personal.title: Personal Information You Provide
personal.name: Name and contact information when you reach out through contact forms
personal.message: Messages and inquiries you send through the website

automatic.title: Information Collected Automatically
automatic.ip: IP address and general location information
automatic.usage: Website usage patterns and analytics data

collection.title: How I Collect Information
collection.cookies: Cookies and similar tracking technologies for preferences
collection.interaction: Your interactions with website features and content

usage.title: How I Use Your Information
usage.respond: Respond to your inquiries and professional opportunities
usage.improve: Improve website functionality and user experience
usage.analytics: Analyze website performance and visitor engagement
usage.communicate: Communicate about potential collaborations or opportunities
usage.legal: Comply with legal obligations and protect against misuse

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.general: I do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described below:

exceptions.title: Limited Exceptions
exceptions.legal: When required by law or to protect legal rights
exceptions.providers: With trusted service providers who assist in website operations (Vercel, accessibility services)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: I use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website performance.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Required for website functionality, including theme preferences and language settings

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Help me understand how visitors interact with the website through Vercel Analytics

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.content: Remember your settings and preferences for future visits

vercel.title: Vercel Analytics
vercel.content: I use Vercel Analytics to understand website performance and visitor behavior. This service may collect anonymous usage data.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Service
accessibility.content: I use accessibility tools to ensure the website is usable by people with disabilities. These services may collect data about accessibility feature usage.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: I implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is completely secure, and I cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: I retain personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy or as required by law. Contact form submissions are typically retained for up to 2 years unless you request deletion.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.access: Access the personal information I have about you
rights.delete: Request deletion of your personal information
rights.object: Object to processing of your information
rights.portability: Request transfer of your data to another service

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: This website is not intended for children under 13 years of age. I do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you become aware that a child has provided me with personal information, please contact me immediately.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. I ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: I may update this Privacy Policy periodically. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for changes.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact me at:

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.intro_paragraph_1: is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. I am continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.
accessibility.intro_paragraph_2: This website aims to conform to Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards to ensure accessibility for users with disabilities.
accessibility.accessibility_initiative_1: I take accessibility seriously and strive to adhere to the
accessibility.accessibility_initiative_2: Level AA standards. These guidelines explain how to make web content more accessible to people with disabilities.
accessibility.feature_text_resize: Text size adjustment - increase or decrease text size
accessibility.feature_text_spacing: Text spacing adjustment - increase or decrease spacing between letters
accessibility.feature_line_height: Line height adjustment - increase or decrease line spacing
accessibility.feature_invert_colors: Color inversion - invert website colors for better contrast
accessibility.feature_gray_hues: Grayscale mode - convert colors to grayscale
accessibility.feature_underline_links: Link highlighting - underline all clickable links
accessibility.feature_big_cursor: Large cursor - increase cursor size for better visibility
accessibility.feature_reading_guide: Reading guide - highlight current reading line
accessibility.feature_disable_animations: Animation control - disable website animations and transitions
accessibility.contact_us_paragraph: If you encounter any accessibility barriers while using this website, or if you have suggestions for improvement, please don't hesitate to contact me. I value your feedback and am committed to making this website accessible to everyone.
accessibility.accessibility_commitment: I am committed to maintaining and improving the accessibility of this website. Regular accessibility audits are conducted, and updates are made to ensure ongoing compliance with accessibility standards. Your feedback helps me identify areas for improvement and ensure that all users can access and use this website effectively.
